title: Object-Oriented Fractal Trees
description: More algorithmic botany! Another way to generate a fractal tree is to consider every part of the tree an object, so that we can apply forces and attributes to all the branches and leaves and more!

timestamps.title: Add a single Branch object for the root of the tree
Write a branch object to created 2 attached branch objects
Create a direction vector that points from the beginning to the end of the vector
Add a new branch to the right
Add a new branch to the left
Push new branches to the tree when the mouse is pressed
Add leaves at the end of the branches

codeExamples.title: Fractal Trees - Object Oriented
codeExamples.description: An object-oriented fractal tree made in p5.js
